title: Learning Design Practical Competency Enhancement: Scientific Problem-Solving Simulation for Overcoming Cognitive Biases

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of the scientific inquiry process and basic experimental design
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can identify four cognitive biases (momentum bias, confirmation bias, probabilistic judgment bias, sequence effect bias) that may occur during scientific problem-solving.
Learners can recover or avoid biased decision-making by over 70% through simulation-based training.
Learners can analyze bias-inducing factors during the debriefing process and propose three or more bias-resistant thinking frameworks.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
